author: Antonia Farzan
title: A doctor got angry that teen girls weren’t practicing social distancing. Then he attacked them, police say. - The Washington Post
description: A doctor got angry that teen girls weren’t practicing social distancing. Then he attacked them, police say. The Washington Post #SocialDistancingWhileBlack: Video Allegedly Shows Doctor Allegedly Strangling Black Teen for Not Social Dista The Root Louisville-…
content:
Obviously, we do not advise individuals concerned about social distancing to take matters into their own hands and confront people about it, especially in any physical way, police said in a statement to local media outlets.
